name: DOOM ROOMS. Beta.
description:
DOOM ROOMS.  Ver. 0.2.0

Being a Doom Rooms engineer isn't as complicated as the rumors say, it's just a matter of finding batteries and putting them in the right places... Oh, and avoiding getting caught by the Doom entities, of course.

Try the 3 available doom rooms, escape from them and unlock all the characters, hats and secrets! Are you up for it?

How to play. To move:
- WASD or Arrows on keyboard.
- Digital Joystick on Touch devices.
Pick the Batteries and place them
in the correct spots.Go through the doors when you unlock
them to finish the levels. Soon more rooms and unlockables. Created on Fancade.
